DTMod:SpireHeart.NAME: Spire Heart
DESCRIPTIONS: NL You feel the bond with your dragon...

DTMod:Vampires.NAME: Vampires(?)
DESCRIPTIONS: Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~mighty~ ~and~ ~brave~ ~ones,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~

DTMod:BookOnTheFloor.NAME: Book on the Floor
DESCRIPTIONS: You enter an eerie room with wall of books. NL Looking around, you find an impressive looking book on the ground. NL You NEED TO pick up this book.
Your mind overflows with mythical energy. You decide to make bond with others.
